Summary: MIAMI: Homestead, Florida . 3 UFO ascend...New Years Eve 12.31.2012
divs: sighting detailsdate of incident: 12.31.2012..new years eve... time: approximately 20:50 eastern time. as i exited my house..i think i may have heard a sort-of loud metal-on-metal bang for about 3\4 of a second..not sure). facing eastward, i immediately saw a huge amount of white spark-like light (3 tiimes in 2 minutes or so),as bright as a transformer exploding at night,coming from the edge of a "flat\orangish object"..at the tree top, horizon level. i immediately, knew they were ufo's ascending into the sky! as the object rose, the "heavy cascading white spark-light--light turned yellowish at the bottom of this "cascade". then the "orange de-materailized" as it rose,and only a dark-grey saucer was visible. the "flying saucer" would not have been visible but for a few clouds in the night sky (it was under the cloud level.) it reached a height of 400-500ft. it moved slowly in a mainly west or wnw direction..as the "saucer" flew over the northen edge of fauslo park,in homestead, fla. i could see it was a grey saucer...then it flew literally right over my head. i got an extremely good look at it. the "flying saucer" was circular, dark-dark grey, with a small black area in the middle underside. as the saucer drifted over-head, it began to emit from the rim of the round saucer a "slight liquid-like-rain-drop-like light" downward about 50 ft. after the "electric-field\liquid-like yellowish light" reached 50ft downward (2 seconds) the ...neon-orange sphere "materialized" right over my head...it appeared 50ft. under the saucer. "they were" still moving slowly westward over the evergalades..the orange sphere was about 10-15ft. across...it reminded me of a ..."m i n i - s u n"...( i think t h a t is what the "orange sphere" truly is)...the orange orb had 'corona' coming off it--not flames,it seemed to bubble\with orange\yellow\red.."corona" coming off just like documentaries on our sun !!!!! i could see inside the orange orb , there appeared to be a 'sort-of" rotating white\yellowish\orange light at the center...thus there were the "flying suace , with the cascading light field downward 50ft. with the organge orb under the saucer at 50ft.moving westward, then turned north. my neighbor said the other 2 ufo's went over the clouds, westward, then turned north also. they all three ascended from the "exact' same spot on the horizen, in the same manner...i can not believe 10's or hundreds of people did not see this, i did notice as the saucer first drifted over the northern-part of park, local people stopped lighting, new years eve fire works...there was no noise, no heat, no cold during the incident except for the initial-possible "bang for 3\4 of second". previous to this siting on 12.31.2012..for the ten days preceeding this various triangle craft had been seen in the night sky. this incident happened approximately 10miles due west of turkey point nuclear power plant, which it-self is just south of homestead airforce base... my inital feelings..right after the sigthing was "they" are totaly in-different to we, humans...as we humans are to ants or roaches.."they"...."simply are tolerating us, as humans tolerate pests" ..and actually controlling us in their on way.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Homestead
There were no other sightings in Homestead on or around December 31st 2012
